titleInfo.title: PZ 8412/38 'Proposed purchase of two British ships by Persian Govt.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 13; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists of correspondence regarding the proposed purchase of two British ships by the Persian Government for trade between the Gulf ports and ports in India and Europe.Correspondents include the British Minister at Tehran, and the Foreign Office.The file includes a divider which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
